name: Lava Survival Beta
description:
What is it?

In Lava Survival, you must survive several action-packed waves of burning lava using a variety of blocks and quick thinking. 

  • Fast gameplay where the incoming lava gets progressively more difficult!
  • Build bases with blocks to try and survive as long as possible!
  • Multiple maps with different weather for a more varied playing experience!
  • Statistics and highscores. Compare with friends!
  • An online leaderboard. Compete for the top spot!
Extra Info

The controls can be accessed from the settings screen in the main menu, and the game can be paused at any time by pressing 'Escape'. Here's the basics:

  • WASD or Arrows: Move
  • Left Click: Place block
  • Right Click: Delete block
  • Scroll Wheel: Change selected block
Leave Feedback!

The game isn't quite done yet, so if you do happen to pick it up, be sure to leave feedback! Any and all constructive criticism is highly appreciated! I'll take all suggestions into consideration to make this game the best that it can be.

I plan to update the game with new maps and features over the course of the next few months up until the final version.

If you want to stay up to date, I post development on Twitter @ksticcgames. I'll also try to make devlogs on major new features and releases.
